page.description: Fires when the .updateRow() method is called before the rows are actually updated.

argument.name: index
argument.description: A zero-based row number of the row to be updated.

discussion.p: The *[js:onBeforeUpdateRow]* event can be used to perform additional validation before a row is updated. The *[js:<listObj>.updateRow()]* call can be cancelled by returning false. ate the row with, and 'index' - zero based row number of row to be update.
